name: Compression (monkeybrains12)
description:
After a mysterious threat claims the Earth and makes its way onboard your space station, you are forced to find a way to escape. Can you discern the nature of this mysterious threat you now face? And more importantly, can you survive? Choose carefully. Your choices may determine what becomes of humanity.

A Choose Your Own Adventure text game, Compression takes place in the near future on a series of orbital space stations and exoplanet colonies. This game was written and programmed in the open-source CYOA creation software Twine, made solely by yours truly.

It's not much in its current state, mostly setup and no choices to make as of yet, but I'll keep working on it in the coming weeks. Stay tuned for Chapter 2!
